item.description:
Join me for a bike ride on the East Bay bike path this Saturday, the 3rd of April, at 10:00 AM.

WE WILL BE STARTING ON THE PROVIDENCE SIDE at the parking lot near the Vets Memorial at Scenic Overlook just north of the address listed. Here's a Map of the location.

This will be a bike path ride - no streets, no cars, no worries. As usual, our speed on the bike path will be *significantly slower* than when we ride on roads.

If it is raining OR I get fewer than four YESes I will reschedule for another day.

The East Bay bike path is 14.5 miles of paved bike path from Providence to Bristol. It's pretty flat except for a hill or two at the Providence side.

Once we get back, some of us will DRIVE to The Oasis Grill, a Mediterranean restaurant in Providence for lunch. This will be completely optional and take place after our bike ride.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike. I drive a red car.
item.how_to_find_us: Try my cell 401-699-7304. I have a red car and a red bike.
item.name: East Bay Bike Path (Providence Side) w/ OPTIONAL trip to Oasis Grill
